body: it would be useful to enable readthedocs PR preview of docs see https://docs.readthedocs.io/en/stable/pull-requests.html. Once this is enabled incoming PRs will build the PR docs you can view the rendered page. Definitely useful for reviewing documentation changes live by clicking on the PR as pose to reviewing the file. Take for example this PR in e4s project https://github.com/E4S-Project/e4s/pull/33 You will see the CI check including the build for user docs One can actually navigate the the PR previewed docs at https://e4s--33.org.readthedocs.build/en/33/.
title: readthedocs PR build
